name: Entertainment Publications
overview: Entertainment Publications, LLC offers consumer savings and merchant promotions products and services. The company publishes savings books that provide discount on restaurants, hotels, resorts, movie theatres, grocery stores, car repairs and washes, video rental stores, dry cleaning establishments, professional and college sporting events, and attractions. It also offers a membership savings package; online savings subscriptions; customized discount programs, including coupon books, directories, newsletters, and cards; and educational activity kits, as well as giftwrap and related accessories, stationary, gift items, gourmet edibles, and chocolates for the fundraising market. The companyâ€™s products are used by schools, community, employee groups, large corporations, and small businesses. It serves markets in the United States, Canada, and Puerto Rico; and has international licensees in Australia, New Zealand, Europe, and Asia. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Troy, Michigan.

milestones.description: MH Enquity Investors buys Entertainment Publications
milestones.source_text: IAC has sold Entertainment Publications Inc. (EPI), publisher of The Entertainment Book, to MH Equity Investors. The deal puts $135 million on the books for IAC, although MH Equity, an Indianapolis company, probably paid only a portion of that in cash. IAC paid $280 million for the property in 2004, but recently wrote down $100 million of the investment.
milestones.source_description: IAC Sells Off Entertainment Publications Inc.
